name: chainlink-dev
description: This project contains tooling for Chainlink local development.

scripts.start: npm run network1:start-ganache && npm run truffle:migrate-network1 && npm run network2:start-ganache && npm run truffle:migrate-network2 && npm run up:all
scripts.truffle:migrate-network1: cd ./truffle/ && npx truffle migrate --reset --network network1 && cd ..
scripts.truffle:migrate-network2: cd ./truffle/ && npx truffle migrate --reset --network network2 && cd ..
scripts.truffle:fund-client: cd ./truffle && npx truffle exec ./scripts/fund-client.js --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.truffle:init-setup: npm run truffle:fund-client && npm run truffle:prep-node
scripts.truffle:prep-node: cd ./truffle && npx truffle exec ./scripts/prep-node.js --network ganache && cd ..
